content: stitch pull up a loop yo pull through one directions loop yo pull through two loops leaving a 6 tail ch6 stitches five stitches will be worked for ribbing single_crochet single_crochet skip first chain and single_crochet into top loop of next five chain stitches ch1 turn skip skip *sc1 into the blo of each stitch ch1 turn repeat from * until there are slip_stitch slip_stitch 35 ridges or 70 row join the ribbing strip into a circle with slip stitches connecting the last row to the beginning chain stitches connect body of cowl to ribbing round 1 place locking stitch marker into the first stitch as you pick up and sc70 stitches in the round two stitches are picked up in between each v at the top of the ribbing there will be 70 stitches rounds 2-16 exsc to eor place marker into the first stitch of the round remember to replace the marker every round fan stitch edging final round *sc1 sk1 exsc5 into next stitch sk1 repeat from * to eor slip_stitch into first single_crochet to finish cut the yarn leaving a 6 tail and pull through the live stitch weave in ends please free to contact me with any questions dianelaugustin@mac com designed and crocheted by diane l augustin thank you to diane for modeling copyright 2025 all rights reserved www yarnhappybeadhappy com www yarnhappybeadhappy etsy com http //www ravelry com/designers/diane-l-augustin
